page.title: 17A DAY IN THE LIFE OF NIGEL
page.content: My day begins at 6.00am.I go jogging till 6.45.On Tuesday,swimming day,I have a diet breakfast,of orange juice,black coffee with no sugar,Special 'K',and grapefruit.At 8.30 I go to school.I come in and do English and Spellmaster and have Assembly.Back in class we get on with our maths.I am doing very well.We do this until playtime when I play leapfrog.When the bell goes we go in.After play we go swimming until 12.00.We have lunch until 1.10,then work until 3.15.Then Mrs.Anscombe tells us a story.We go home and I have some tea.It is milk,bread and cheese.I play with Andrew.I get washed and go to bed at 9 o'clock after a supper of hot milk and biscuits.
